scenario_text.value: *huff*...*huff* We actually...made it!
Looks like we all got out in time.
Saki, how’s your leg?
I think I can walk on it now.
Thanks, Kaito.
Nah, I should be thanking you. You saved Miu.
Speaking of which, Miu, are you all right?

Seems like she’s having a hard time taking
all of this in.

I bet. She probably never imagined things
could get this bad.
That’s what it was like for me, too.

Grr... If only I’d been with her, this never
would’ve happened!

And she may never have realized how cruel
this world can be.
Urk...

Sometimes you gotta suffer to learn a hard
lesson.
I think we oughtta give her some space.
Anyway, we need to keep moving.

Let’s get out of here before some enemy
monster—
Are those...screams?
Huh? Haru, what was that?
I hear screams... Over that way.
That way...
(Don’t tell me...)
Aaaaaah!!!
Stop! Please, stop!
It’s them! Palmon and Patamon!

Wh-what the heck?! Something’s coming this
way!

Bad news, Takuma! Some real strong enemies
are headed straight for us!

My senses tell me...these are no ordinary
foes!
There! It’s them!

Hmph! So, this is where those fools with the
human children have come!
Prey... So much...prey...
(These are the attackers?!)
They give me the chills!

What is with those guys? Did you catch the
look in their eyes? They gotta be bad news.

Er... Uh... What? These aren’t like the
monsters I know at all...
Miu, you stay right next to me, okay?
Leave the children...to me...

Of course. The children are no concern of
mine.

Oh yeah? We’ll see about that, Mr. Big Bad
Wolf!
Don’t you call me that! I am Garurumon!
Are... Are you with Arukenimon?!

Pah! I care nothing for trash like her! Now,
let’s see, I think...
You’re the biggest threat!
Urk!
Take this!
Bah! How dare you!
(Garurumon just leapt at Falcomon!)

I hear you’ve formed a bond with these human
whelps!
Argh... He’s quite strong! Watch out!
Falcomon!
Hahaha, now let’s see this power of yours!
Let go of Falcomon!
Whoa! He’s strong!
Take this!
What?! I’m being pushed back?
Unnngh...
Aren’t you going to help them?!
Bah! Why are you always so useless?
Unngh...

What, don’t tell me that’s all you’ve got?
I thought you were supposed to be strong!
Now’s my chance...
These children...are mine...
Hey! B-back off!
No... Stop!
Get away from Miu!
You... You keep away from our queen!
We won’t let you take her!
Save the queen!!!
No! All of you, stop!
Don’t...interfere...
Urgh!
Yeowch!
Gah...

No... No... They’re all suffering...
All because of me...
Pathetic...

Rrk... We’re not...finished yet! We will...
protect...the queen!

No, stop! That’s enough! Please, you don’t
have to fight for me!
Miu?! What’re you thinking?! Get back here!

So this...is the child...who escaped from
Arukenimon... I’ll get her!
Eep!
I don’t think so!
Out of...my way...
Aoi!

It’s after Miu! We have to get her out of
here!
Right! Miu, come this way!
You’re not getting away...

Well, first you’ll have to go through us!
Bring it on!
Hurry, this way!
But...what about everyone else?

They all really thought I was a sorceress!
They fought to protect me!
But I haven’t done anything for them!

You’re the one in the most danger right now!
So you’ll need to hide in the castle for—
Wha’? Aaah!
You’re not going anywhere...

You already beat Agumon and the others?!
Well, I won’t let you hurt Aoi or Miu!

Hmph, I barely even touched them.
So pathetic.

But what about you? Looks like you’ve got
some fight in you.
I’m not letting you hurt Miu!

That’s the spirit, Aoi! So what if you’re
trembling? Leave this to me! I can handle it!
Oh, this is awful! I’m so scared!

You should be. Not all monsters are cute and
cuddly.
Hmph. Pathetic.
What? He’s...leaving?
The human brats...
You will let them go...?

I came here so I could crush the fools who
bonded with the human children.

I’m not on some stupid hunt for children like
you and your friends.
Garurumon... You traitor...

Traitor? How am I a traitor? I’ve never been
one of you!

I’m not sure what’s going on, but it looks
like...they’re fighting?!

You...
You think this is our chance to escape?
I will take...the child sacrifice...
Hey! You’re not taking Miu anywhere!
What can you do? You’re only human...
You will not harm our friends and partners!
Hmph... Don’t you know when to stay down?

I just tripped ’cause you surprised me!
I ain’t done yet!
Yeah, that’s right!
Well, at least you’ve got guts.

All right, then. Let’s see what you can do in
a real fight, not just a contest of strength.
Wouldn’t have it any other way!

(I don’t see any way out of this without
a fight, but these two are crazy strong.)

(If only there was something I could say to
help our partners give their all...)
(But what might that be?!)
Challenge Garurumon to a fight!
Agumon and the gang are too much for you.
Agitate Garurumon!
Bring it, Garurumon!

(If it’s a fight he wants, I’ll show him it’s
a fight he’s gonna get!)
Bring it on, Garurumon!

Hmph! Well, at least you’ve got the guts to
stand and fight, I’ll give you that!

Oh, we’ve got more than just guts! We’re
gonna take you down!
Well said, Agumon! Victory will be ours!
We’ll see about that.

I believe in Agumon, and in every one of our
partners!
Then this should be interesting.
Heheheh... Bring it on!
You’re done for!
Agumon and the gang are too much for you!

I may have let my guard down a bit earlier,
but I’m not letting that happen again!
Yeah, we’ll show you just what we can do!

Hahaha! Just what I wanted to hear!
Bring it on!
Aren’t you ashamed?

How dare you pick on little kids like that!
On girls!
What?! That’s...that’s not what’s happening!
Cowards like you are the worst!
Yeah... I’m with you!
Me? A COWARD?!
(Aha, he’s starting to get flustered.)

(He may be tough, but he seems like the type
that takes pride in a fair fight.)

(He’s an intimidating opponent all right,
but...here goes nothing!)
